metadata.title: CVE-2014-3562 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Red Hat Directory Server 8 and 389 Directory Server, when debugging isenabled, allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive replicated metadata bysearching the directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3562` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.3.4.9-1
389-ds-base - 1.3.4.9-1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.3.4.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.4.9-1').
